name: Portrait of a Man
description: Portrait of a Man; Hyacinthe Rigaud (French, 1659 - 1743); about 1710 - 1720; Black chalk, brush with gray wash, heightened with white and gray gouache, on blue-gray paper; 35.6 × 27.9 cm (14 × 11 in.); 86.GB.612; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Portrait of a Man
medium: Black chalk, brush with gray wash, heightened with white and gray gouache, on blue-gray paper
